description:
Solve the **Longest Palindromic Substring** problem.

Given a string s, find the longest substring that is a palindrome. If multiple valid answers exist, return any one of them.

See the full problem description on [LeetCode](https://leetcode.com/problems/longest-palindromic-substring/).
constraints: s consists of only digits and English letters
